column1: Smoque BBQ////Ribs: holy moly these were delicious. When people write reviews saying this was the best bbq place in Chicago for ribs
column2: couldn't agree more! The ribs were well cooked and the meat on them was delicious!!!! There wasn't any fat it was all big juicy meats on the ribs. Incredible
column3: it really was. The sauce BLEW MY MIND!!! they gave us two cups of the sauce and we finished both
column4: craving more. The sauce was so good I could honestly eat it plain which is totally nasty but feels totally right.
